settings.heading: What is the Carcan?
settings.row_content: CarCan is a trash can, a storage bag, and a cooler. It is washable and reusable, and stops people from littering and using plastic bags. CarCan is win win win! You can’t lose with a CarCan.

settings.heading: What is the size of a Carcan?
settings.row_content: CarCan is 10 inches in length, 6 inches in width, and 14.5 inches in height.

settings.heading: How long is the CarCan’s strap?
settings.row_content: The CarCan's strap can be extended to 17 inches.

settings.heading: How much weight does CarCan can hold?
What is the material used for CarCan?
settings.row_content: The material we use for CarCan is 600D/PU polyester + PEVA.

settings.heading: What is the material used for CarCan?
settings.row_content: The material we use for CarCan is 600D/PU polyester + PEVA.

settings.heading: What are CarCan’s features?
settings.row_content: CarCan is washable, waterproof, reusable and an environment-friendly alternative to plastic bags. The CarCan has a metal frame to give a wide opening for easy access and also has straps to the neck of the car’s seat. It's made from quality materials to last.

settings.heading: Where is the CarCan made?
settings.row_content: The CarCan is manufactured world wide and was created in Canada and sold by a Canadian company.

settings.heading: Where is the CarCan made?
settings.row_content: The CarCan is manufactured world wide and was created in Canada and sold by a Canadian company.

settings.heading: Do you have a physical store?
settings.row_content: We only sell online at the moment but will soon be available in department stores.

settings.heading: How do you ship?
settings.row_content: All orders are shipped using DHL eCommerce, USPS, YunExpress, or ePacket depending on your location and fastest available service.

settings.heading: What are your accepted payment methods?
settings.row_content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Shop Pay, Bitcoin, Zelle, Venmo, Cash app, and FB Pay.

settings.heading: Why are you charging in USD?
settings.row_content: Our prices are in US dollars as we cater to customers internationally. The final cost charged will depend on the conversion rates by your payment method.

settings.heading: What is the size of the trunk organizer?
settings.row_content: The trunk organizer is 58 cm in length, 32cm in width, and 50 cm in height.

settings.heading: Is ordering from these FB ads safe and legit?
settings.row_content: Rest assured the CarCan is a legit business for several years and you can find many satisfied customer reviews on our website and through Sitejabber. We have sold 1 million CarCans on Facebook.
